snippet: Representative Paul D. Ryan was the face of the Republican ticket once again on Tuesday, fully embracing the role of tormentor in chief of President Obama.
abstract: Representative Paul D Ryan is the face of the Republican ticket once again, blitzing morning television shows and skipping between battleground states, fully embracing the role of tormentor in chief of President Obama; Mitt Romney keeps a low profile as he prepares for the coming presidential debates.
lead_paragraph: Representative Paul D. Ryan was the face of the Republican ticket once again on Tuesday, fully embracing the role of tormentor in chief of President Obama.

headline.seo: Ryan Campaigns While Romney Readies for Debates
headline.main: Ryan Carries Load While Romney Readies for Debates
headline.print_headline: Ryan Carries Load While Romney Readies for Debates
